features: Set of 4 new natural frangranced shower gels. All made in the UK, Vegan and in recyclable bottles.
1 x Zingy Lime shower gel We've wedged 40 real limes into each bottle
1 x Sweet Rhubarb & Raspberry shower gel with 4 Essential Oils in each bottle
1 x Fresh Sea Salt and Samphire with 13 Natural Oils in every bottle
1 x Tropical Coconut & Shea Butter shower gel We've waited 7,872 Tropical hours to make this bottle of Paradise.
description: We are the first one up in the morning, raring to go, constantly exploring new and exciting ways to capture all the potency nature has to offer. Every bottle is packed with the intense power of nature to give you a sensorial hit. Original Source is made with natural plant extracts and authentic fragrances found from all aspects of nature. We believe in respecting the world we live in and that we should live in it loudly and proudly. We innovate, we invigorate. This set includes: 1 x Original Source Fresh Sea Salt & Samphire Shower Gel 250ml 1 x Original Source Sweet Rhubarb & Raspberry Shower Gel 250ml 1 x Original Source Zingy Lime Shower Gel 250ml 1 x Original Source Tropical Coconut & Shea Butter Shower Gel 250ml This is a set of 4 different fragrances. Brought to you by Kingdom Supplies @ Biblegifts and comes with our exclusive beauty tips leaflet.
